Locations.Name: Orange Town
Locations.Description:
A small town with a few houses and Professor Jon's Lab.
North: Route 1

Locations.Name: Professor Jon's Lab
Locations.Description:
Professor Jon's famous laboratory, filled with Pals research equipment.
East: Route 1

Locations.Name: Route 1
Locations.Description:
A grassy path connecting Orange Town and Viridian City. Wild Pals can be found here!
North: Viridian City | East: Log Cabin | South: Orange Town | West: Professor Jon's Lab

Locations.Name: Viridian City
Locations.Description:
A bustling city with a Pal Center and Pal Mart.
North: Route 1 | East: Pal Center

Locations.Name: Pal Center
Locations.Description:
A modern facility where Nurse Noelia heals your Pals and offers advice.
West: Viridian City

Locations.Name: Log Cabin
Locations.Description:
A cozy log cabin deep in the woods, home to Matt.
South: Route 1
